1. When object 0 was on the machine, the light was on.

5. Object 1 consistently did not turn the light on when placed on the machine, suggesting it is not a blicket.
6. Object 0 also consistently turned the light on when placed on the machine.

From this, we can conclude that object 2 is indeed a blicket since it turned the machine on when placed on it.

> True
